item.title: [DISTRELEC-4675] LT // Modifications currency calculator
item.description:
Hi Rubén,
Could you please modify the EURO calculator as followed:

Translate1: Euro calculator -> Euro skaičiuoklė
Translate2: Convert -> Skaičiuoti
Update and translate3: 1 euro = 3.4528 litas -> 1 EUR = 3,45280 LTL

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4667] Search - allow initial exact match
item.description:
Exact-matching has been removed from the search in general because of not disturbing the customer while filtering. Thats fine but we also have the use-case to have an exact match, for example if initially is searched for product number.

The following behavior should be implemented:

  • If by initial search an exact match is found -> display the product detail page automatically.
  • If by further filtering an exact-match is generated -> don't display the detail page automatically.(Already in place)

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4657] Checkout - Validate orderNote
item.description:
Relates from ticket: DISTRELEC-4630

orderNote-validation is missing. Therefore if more than 1000 chars are entered in the order-note and hit on checkout-button the request ends in a proxy-error. If less than 1000 chars are entered, the order can be placed normally. Please set the validation to 1000 characters for the ordernote-field.

comments.comment: Hi Ruben, this will be part of the next sprint, please estimate - thanks.
0.25d of FE dev and testing

When the customer clicks on butto Go to ERP this exception is genereated:

java.lang.NullPointerException
at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.eprocurement.data.oci.DefaultDistSAPProduct.getItemPrice(DefaultDistSAPProduct.java:163)
at de.hybris.platform.oci.jalo.utils.Utils.generateHtmlData(Utils.java:290)

The problem is caused because the product 11029605 (764055) has a special price and then there is no List price for that article.
I've changed the logic to check if the list price is present, if not the Base Price will be used.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4650] Dynamic currency in order calculation
item.description:
As we had agreed order calculation should take into account the currency that has been selected for a specific customer.
Currently for e.g. a german customer which has agreed to pay in CHF instead of EUR webshop is showing the amounts calculated in CHF but the currency in EUR

comments.comment:
@Evangelos:
Please help me to reproduce the failure...

  • Which system (D, Q)?
  • Which login (username / password)?
    Thank you!

user:evangelos.kontopoulos@lodestonemc.com
pwd: distrelec1
in the Q system http://test.distrelec.de
Lower proirity since this is not a production issue.

@Francesco:
Can you please take care about this issue.
We have a test account (see above) that has currency CHF defined. If logged in the customer prices are show but with the wrong currency.
Example: http://test.distrelec.de/de/Interface-Isolator-SOIC-20W-Analog-Devices-ADM3251EARWZ/p/11029825
When logged in the price should be CHF 8.37
(Not sure whether you have implemented this already in v2.0 or in v3.0 only.)

I have seen this error...

[DefaultDistCustomerAccountService] Currency 'CHF' defined on company is not available for this site.

But even after allowing CHF for test.distrelec.de the currency remains EUR instead of CHF.

Hi Evangelos
on our side the fix has been implemented and the issue is solved.
There is only one point of attention that we need to consider.

When a customer has a different currency than the default one on the site, than we have to be sure that all the list prices are available on the webshop. This means that we would expect to receive with IF-02 all the prices for all currencies that could be used by the customers.

As alternative, instead of receiving the prices for all the producst for multiple currencies with IF-02, the online prices could be used. This means that when the customer has a different currency, with IF-08 we would expect to receive the onlineCalculation flag set to true.

I think we can consider both opportunities depending on the volumes.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4648] Facets Range Slider: If user enters value higher than absoluteMaxValue, avoid error message and correct input
item.description:
Facet Range Slider, e.g. http://dev.distrelec.ch.distrelec.com/search?q=led&filter_Price=1+-+1

If the user enters a max value that is higher than absoluteMaxValue, at the moment an error is returned (Max Value cannot be higher than absolute Max Value)

Desired behavior for this case: User input gets replaced with absoluteMaxValue, and filter gets applied.

Same principle also for "Min Value cannot be lower than absolute Min Value"
item.summary: Facets Range Slider: If user enters value higher than absoluteMaxValue, avoid error message and correct input

comments.comment: fixed, can be tested after next deployment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4646] CH P // Shopping List with more than 11 items (12 items and more)
item.description:
Issue reported by customers.

Rested by me

when a shopping cart has more than 11 items, when I try to add all list to the cart, the cart only contains 10 products.

please see the print screens.
item.summary: CH P // Shopping List with more than 11 items (12 items and more)

comments.comment: Works on our side --> Screenshot
Problem seems to happen with IE.

The problem is when we click on the Add all button, only the displayed products will be added to the cart. If we click on the show more link to display more products, and then we click on the Add all, we will have more than 10 products added to the cart.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4555] Education meets experience form
item.description:
Context:
Please create a form to add to a CMS page for the CH Shop in German, French and English (Translations will follow today).

  • Promotion spot on the top
  • The form should contain 3 different parts separated by titles
  • The form should contain form fields and checkboxes
  • (UPDATE 14.07) The form should contain 3 different upload buttons where the customer can upload a file. These files should be stored in the db and should be downloadable by FTP. The files should have a customer related naming or a specific directory.
  • The export should be written into a CSV according to the Seminar form (http://www.distrelec.ch/info-center/seminar/register) --> Write the data into a file on /env-hp-p/inout/misc/educationRegistrations/export/educationRegistrations_1402696821670.csv
  • Registration confirmation should be sent out to the customers (Email text and translation will follow today)

Part 1:
Title: Ameldung E-Talent Day 2014
Ich lerne:
Checkboxes: Bereich

  • Elektroniker/-in
  • Polymechaniker/-in
  • Informatiker/-in
  • Automatiker/-in
  • Elektroinstallateur/-in
  • Telematiker-/in (Multimediaelektroniker, Physiklaborant, Konstrukteur)

Form Fields:

  • Name (Mandatory)
  • Vorname(Mandatory)
  • Mobile-Nr.
  • Festnetz
  • Adresszeile 1 (Mandatory)
  • Addresszeile 2
  • Ort (Mandatory)
  • Land (Mandatory)
  • Email (Mandatory)
  • Email bestätigen (Mandatory)

Part 2:
Title: Angabe zur Ausbildungsstelle
Form Fields:

  • Firma (Mandatory)
  • Adresszeile 1 (Mandatory)
  • Adresszeile 2
  • Postleitzahl (Mandatory)
  • Ort (Mandatory)
  • Land (Mandatory)
  • Email (Mandatory)
  • Email bestätigen (Mandatory)

--> Send button

comments.comment: FE: 4 hours
BE estimation: 10h
Using /distrelecB2Bstorefront/web/webroot/WEB-INF/terrific/modules/form-seminar-signup/form-seminar-signup.jsp as template for new file form-education-meets-experience.jsp.
I got some FE updates from the business. See screenshot

Attached the translations for the forms and the confirmation email.
Also attached a screenshot for the confirmation email.

Here is the summarized text for the confirmation email:

GERMAN:

Vielen Dank für Deine Anmeldung oder Bewerbung zum E-Talent Day 2014 am 30.Oktober. Wir werden Dir in Kürze den Programmablauf zukommen lassen.

Bitte erzähle auch Deinen Kolleginnen und Kollegen von unserem „E-Talent Day 2014“ und der Möglichkeit für die Besten unter Euch, attraktive Warengutscheine zu gewinnen. Profitiert gemeinsam von der Chance, mit dem Top-Management eines internationalen Unternehmens zu diskutieren und Tipps für Eure berufliche Zukunft zu erhalten.

Mit freundlichem Gruss
Dein Distrelec Team

FRENCH :
Un grand merci pour ton inscription ou candidature à l’E-Talent-Day 2014 du 30 octobre. Nous te ferons parvenir prochainement le programme.

Parle aussi s'il te plaît avec tes collègues de notre «E-Talent Day 2014» et de la possibilité de gagner des prix en espèces intéressants pour les meilleurs d'entre vous. Profitez ensemble de la chance de discuter avec les top managers d'une société internationale et d'obtenir des conseils pour votre avenir professionnel.

Avec nos meilleures salutations,
L’équipe Distrelec

ENG:
Thank you for registering or applying for the E-Talent Day 2014 on 30 October. We will send you the full programme shortly.

Please also tell your colleagues about the “E-Talent Day 2014”, and the opportunity for the best among you to win attractive gift vouchers. You can all take advantage of the chance to discuss with the top management of an international enterprise and gain tips for your future career.

Yours sincerely,
Your Distrelec Team
FE checked in to SVN.

Hi erik,
Could please modify the following things (Screenshots):

1. Please correct the break at "Telematiker-/in (Multimediaelektroniker, Physiklaborant, Konstrukteur)" --> Should be on the same line
2. The Buttons should have the same size. Please aligne them.
3. We need a bigger gap between the buttons and "Angabe zur Ausbildungsstelle"

Hi Erik,
Please change aswell the naming of the marked form-fields(see screenshot edu_award_change.png)

Additional adjustments:

  • Filesize: max. 20mB
  • Filetype-limitation: .doc, .docx, .pdf, .zip, .rar

Thanks.

Additional changes:

  • There is a typo on "Details of training centre", the correct word would be "center".
  • We need to add the mood teaser on the form. You can find the images here:
    J:\Distrelec\Marketing Services\ALL\02 E-Business\04 Online marketing\01_2014\15_Special projects\11_Education meets experience\01_Visuals\Mood_teaser

All changes uploaded to SVN, except the mood teaser. Shouldn't that be added in the CMS?

• Please adjust the alignment of the form like in screenshot: edu_exp_microsite_formV2.jpg
  • The upload buttons should always have "Upload the" on the first line and the rest on the second line.
  • Add some space between "Details of training center" and the form.

--> I concluded this shortly in the attached screenshot(education_award_changes.png) but please use "edu_exp_microsite_formV2.jpg" as design reference.
Right-aligning the labels is not in compliance with the style guide. See. e.g. https://www.distrelec.ch/register/b2c

I will clarify if the design should be changed against styleguide.

Hi Ruben, the rest of the form will stay like it is, just some small text adjustment, then we're fine:

  • Replace the actual text(If you would like to apply as a candidate for one of the three different prizes, then please submit the relevant documents by uploading them here. The best marks, or the drawing of lots, shall decide.) with:
    "If you would like to apply as a candidate for one of the three awards, please submit the relevant documents by uploading them below." <br>
    "Contest details: E-Talent 2014 Award will be decided based on the best marks. Student Exchange and Motivation Award winners are decided based on a draw."
  • Replace "detail of training center" with “Company Details”.

Thanks.

Ideally done together with DISTRELEC-3723

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3863] Change handling of Movex Customer / Adapt Customer Data Model
item.description:
Situation:

  • The current implementation is in some cases coupled to close to Movex.
  • It is not possible to connect a newly registered user to an existing MovexCustomer for the Distrelec Vertrieb

Solution:

  • We currently assume that each B2BUnit has a MovexCustomer attached. This shall not be the case anymore. The shop shall work correctly without an attached MovexCustomer, too. Functionality to especially keep an eye on:
    • Determination of price (scale shift, rebate models)
    • Determination of free shipping
    • Determination of allowed payment/shipping methods (e.g. is invoice allowed)
    • In general.. every call of B2BUnit.getMovexCustomer() has to be verified.
  • Registration process to be changed:
    • Do not create a MovexCustomer (that currently will be attached to the B2BUnit) anymore. This step will be done later in the backend process.
  • Backend process to be changed:
    • By entering a customerErpId, an existing MovexCustomer will be searched and attached if found (Important: Search needs to be done in the sales org the user belongs to!). If non was found, a new MovexCustomer will be created and attached to the B2BUnit. The information for the new MovexCustomer can be taken from the B2BUnit and its billing address.
    • Ensure that a MovexCustomer is only created if the sales org of the B2Bunit belongs to the Movex ERP system!
    • Ensure shop is working correctly in case multiple B2BUnits are having the same MovexCustomer: MovexB2BUnitValidateInterceptor to be changed
    • Sales org and customer type should be mandatory attributes on the B2BUnit
    • Rename labels on B2BUnit: No Movex related names should be taken if not necessary.
item.summary: Change handling of Movex Customer / Adapt Customer Data Model

comments.comment: added preliminary estimate of 4d
Adrian, please implement this ticket.
Unit tests not yet written.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4590] SEO - URL Duplications Issues - Between Language - rel="alternate" to add
item.description:
Observations :

  • Distrelec.ch, due to the swiss market, have a multilingual website accessible and indexed by crawlers.
  • It is splitted between 3 folder, one for each language and no folder for automatic language detection.
    http://www.distrelec.ch/*
    http://www.distrelec.ch/en/*
    http://www.distrelec.ch/de/*
    http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/*

Impacts :

  • This scenario create a major url language duplication issue.
  • GoogleBot can't crawl properly the website language structure without any indication from our side.
  • GoogleBot crawl ratio on the language structure of our pages :
  • This lead into a major content duplication issue + a really wrong crawlability of the the structure (has to be 33% for every language)
    and finally not be ranked properly inside the search engine result pages.

Demands :

  • All website pages must have a rel="alternate" tag that lead to every language alternative absolute url path in their html head.
    Exemple for http://www.distrelec.ch/ : 
    <link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/" hreflang="x-default" />
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/de/" hreflang="de-ch" />
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/" hreflang="fr-ch" />
<link rel="alternate" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/en/" hreflang="en-ch" />

Checking process :

  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - URL Duplications Issues - Between Language - rel="alternate" to add

comments.comment:
In production check 25/07/14 :

  • Alternate on all pages : NOK

In production check 28/07/14 :

  • Alternate on all pages : NOK

=> Reopening of the issue
